title: Looking for erotic alphabets
content:
hello

does anyone know of the existence,  
or otherwise, of a good quality digital  
version of something resembling the  
attached example? i know the pepin book  
of erotic alphabets, so i'm looking for  
other sources.

thanks!

author: ak

comments.content: To quote the immortal Lou Reed, _everybody had to pay to play_ (heehee).
Erm. I think this belongs in the TYPE ID area.

Looks like some one decided to letter rip :-\>

ChrisL
